text: In 1870s activity of society took place there Estonia is an Estonian society which organises theatrical and musical activities. Society existed 1865-1940 and re-established in 1990.EE, band 12, 2003. Page 121. Society is established in 1865. Society participated in Estonian Song Festival in 1869. In the initiative of society, the Estonia Theatre was established in 1906. Estonian Song Festival (1896) and Estonian Song Festival (1910) was organised by the society (together with the society called Lootus). ==References== ==Further reading== * Natuke Eesti lõbuseltsidest, Eesti Postimees ehk Näddalaleht : ma- ja linnarahvale, nr. 33, 15.
